column2: "I've been talking to Franca, and she told me that the latest trend at events is to have a Cafe Corner!"
"And that's not all! She also told me which desserts are popular right now!"
"From what she told me, it sounded like the best thing for everyone would be desserts shaped like enemies..."
"You're always so kind, I know you'll help me! Which enemies do you think would make the cutest desserts?"
